LanguageData.EOTR_CaravanSite_LetterText: While travelling, your caravan spotted a site: {0}.\nWould you like to approach the site now or mark it for later?
LanguageData.EOTR_TransporterSite_LetterText: While flying to their destination, {0} spotted a site: {1}.\n{0} marked it for later.
LanguageData.EOTR_Site: While travelling, {0} spotted an unknown site. Marking it for later.
